attributes.action: To prevent councils and any other maintenance groups from removing reasonable and tasteful memorials from children's graves without consultation.
attributes.additional_details: The loss of a child is one of the most devistating things a family can endure. All that remains are mostly memories and the memorabilia shared on the ste of burial. It is fully accepted that councils and other maintenance groups have the duty to ensure that graves are kept in order. They also have a duty to have a duty of care to allow families to grieve. the undersigned would respectfully ask that H.M governments requests local governments and/or it's delegate to consult with families prior to ant proposed change.
